data.comment: Today's referee, Tori Penso, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in DC United.
DC United to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 4, Nashville are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Nashville capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Tori Penso awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Nashville.
In the minute 14, In Nashville Nashville attack through Anibal Godoy. The finish is off target, however.
Tori Penso awards DC United a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 16, Tori Penso signals a Nashville throw-in in DC United's half.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Dominique Badji is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
It seems as if Dominique Badji is unable to continue. Alan Winn replaces him for the home team.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
In the minute 27, Nashville have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
In the minute 28, Nashville to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 30, Steve Birnbaum's header is off-target for DC United.
Goal kick for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Nashville's Anibal Godoy misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Throw-in for DC United in the half of Nashville.
Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Nashville.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Nashville in the half of DC United.
Nashville's Dax McCarty gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
DC United to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 36, DC United's Julian Gressel breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Tori Penso awards Nashville a goal kick.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 37, At Nissan Stadium, Russell Canouse has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Daniel Rios for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for DC United at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 40, Ola Kamara of DC United is pulled up for offside.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Nashville.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Nashville.
In the minute 41, Tori Penso signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Rios gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nashville.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Nashville.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Daniel Rios of Nashville gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tori Penso signals a throw-in for Nashville, close to DC United's area.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick DC United.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Russell Canouse (DC United) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Moses Nyeman is replacing Gelmin Rivas for the away team.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 49, DC United have a goal kick.
In Nashville, Derrick Jones of Nashville is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 50, Nashville are coming forward and Dave Romney gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 51, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ola Kamara (DC United) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Tori Penso awards Nashville a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Daniel Rios (Nashville) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Tori Penso signals a Nashville throw-in in DC United's half.
In the minute 56, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tori Penso awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nashville to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In Nashville DC United drive forward through Yamil Asad. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Alistair Johnston for Nashville drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
Throw-in for DC United at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 62, The home team replace Dax McCarty with Randall Leal.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 63, Throw-in DC United.
Throw-in for Nashville close to the penalty box.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In the minute 68, Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Joseph Mora.
Joseph Mora returns to the field for DC United after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 69, Nashville drives forward and Alan Winn gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 70, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
Goal! A Daniel Rios header gives Nashville a 1-0 lead in Nashville.
That's a fine assist from Dave Romney.
Ben Olsen (DC United) is making a second substitution, with Federico Higuain replacing Ola Kamara.
The away team have replaced Oniel Fisher with Chris Odoi-Atsem. This is the third substitution made today by Ben Olsen.
In the minute 73, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tori Penso signals a DC United throw-in in Nashville's half.
Tori Penso awards the away team a throw-in.
Alex Muyl for Nashville is back on the field again.
In the minute 76, The match at Nissan Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alex Muyl, who is down injured.
Griffin Yow is replacing Julian Gressel for DC United at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Nashville.
Nashville's Dave Romney gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
In the minute 79, Tori Penso signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Taylor Washington (Nashville) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
In the minute 81, Nashville needs to be cautious. DC United have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of DC United.
Erik Sorga is on a sub for Yamil Asad for DC United.
In the minute 83, Alex Muyl (Nashville) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jalil Anibaba.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to DC United.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
At Nissan Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tori Penso blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
